value.query:
SELECT
Asset.Id,
Asset.Name,
Asset.InstallDate,
Asset.Tipo_de_Producto__c,
Asset.%vlocity_namespace%__LineNumber__c,
Asset.status

FROM Asset
WHERE 
Asset.AccountId = '{{params.AccountId}}'
AND
Asset.%vlocity_namespace%__ParentItemId__c = '{{params.AssetId}}'
AND
Asset.Tipo_de_Producto__c = 'Servicio Valor Agregado'
